Package it.polimi.ingsw.commons.message

Interface PlayMessageReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayMessageController, PlayMessagesReader
public interface PlayMessageReader
Every class which "reads" play messages needs to implement this interface. This interface on what the executeMessage method bases itself to call the correct method to run by the "reader".

    • playAssistantCard

      void playAssistantCard(String player, Integer weight)
      Take the assistant card and send it to the server
      Parameters:
      player - player name
      weight - weight of chosen card

    • moveStudent

      void moveStudent(String player, TeacherColor color, String fromId, String toId)
      Take the movement of student and send it to the server
      Parameters:
      player - player name
      color - color of student
      fromId - start of movement
      toId - destination of movement
